comments.body: here is the same issue with the storage change race.

I guess so though we do this for admission webhooks here: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/733a381ec42ede15cd0499bc502a0cba6612f3ca/test/e2e/apimachinery/webhook.go#L1067

Does it worth investigating? I mean no harm removing them manually, right?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +134,138 @@
func cleanCRDWebhookTest(client clientset.Interface, namespaceName string) {
	_ = client.CoreV1().Services(namespaceName).Delete(serviceCRDName, nil)
	_ = client.AppsV1().Deployments(namespaceName).Delete(deploymentCRDName, nil)
	_ = client.CoreV1().Secrets(namespaceName).Delete(secretCRDName, nil)
